Dialogue.text: Oh No! Our ship has sunk into the deep sea!
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text:
Even though everyone is safe,
 we have lost some REALLY important eggs!
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: So, we need YOUR help to retrieve them!
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: This is your Buddy! He will guide you through any difficulty along your journey.
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: Choose your favorite type of buddy!
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: What will you name your Buddy?
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: Alright! Now that you have your buddy with you, Are you ready to move on your mission?
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: Come on! It'll be a real fun adventure.
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: This is Sally the Submarine, she will take you to the sunken ship.
Dialogue.Speaker: Doodle

Dialogue.text: I believe we are near the accident site. Look at all the debris around us!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Danger! Danger! My propellors are stuck!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: The crash has broken my propellors. Let us explore the area and see what we can find to fix it.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
